meta.name: Startup Founder Discovery and AI-Powered Outreach with CrunchBase and Gmail

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "subject": "üöÄ Startup Founder Highlights for Outreach - June 6, 2025",
  "body": "üöÄ Here's a summary of promising startup founders for potential outreach:

üîπ **Jane Doe**
Co-Founder & CEO at Acme AI. She is a serial entrepreneur with over 10 years of experience in AI and SaaS startups. Educated at Stanford University with an MBA. You can find her on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/janedoe.

üîπ **John Smith**
CTO at GreenLoop. Passionate about sustainable packaging innovation and technology leadership. Holds a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Environmental Engineering from MIT. Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/johnsmith."

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert at writing concise, professional summaries for business email outreach. Given detailed information about a person‚Äôs professional profile, your task is to generate a short summary focusing only on the most relevant information for outreach emails.

Only include:
- Full name
- Current title/role
- Brief, relevant part of the biography (max 1-2 sentences)
- Key education highlights (school and degree)
- Social links (only LinkedIn or Twitter if available)
- Most relevant associated company (name and role)

Do NOT include unnecessary details. Make the summary clear, engaging, and suitable for a personalized outreach email introduction.

parameters.content:
## üîÅ **SECTION 1: Trigger + Company Fetching**

**üß± Nodes:**

* üîò **Manual Trigger**
* üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Updated Companies List**

---

### üöÄ What This Section Does

üîò **Manual Trigger**
This allows you to manually run the automation anytime you want. Perfect for testing or when you only want to fetch founder data on demand (instead of a scheduled time).

üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Updated Companies List**
This node connects to the **Crunchbase API** to get a list of the latest startups or companies that have been updated recently.

#### üîß What You Can Customize

üõ†Ô∏è **Page Query**:
In the URL or query parameters, you'll find something like `page=1`.
‚û°Ô∏è You can manually change this to `page=2`, `page=3`, etc., to explore other sets of companies.

üõ†Ô∏è **Date Filter**:
The `updated_since` parameter can also be changed to look for startups updated within a certain time window.

---

## üë§ **SECTION 2: Founder Profile Fetching + Field Mapping**

**üß± Nodes:**

* üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Founder Profiles by UUID**
* ‚úèÔ∏è **Edit Fields ‚Äì Extract Key Profile Data**

---

### üîé What This Section Does

üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Founder Profiles by UUID**
For each company fetched in Section 1, this node pulls the **detailed profile** of one person (typically a founder, CEO, or C-level executive).

‚úèÔ∏è **Edit Fields ‚Äì Extract Key Profile Data**
This step takes the raw profile data and selects only the fields we care about:
‚úÖ Full Name,
‚úÖ Title,
‚úÖ Biography,
‚úÖ Education,
‚úÖ Social Links,
‚úÖ Associated Companies

#### üîß What You Can Customize

üî¢ **Person Indexing**:
In this node‚Äôs configuration, you can find the list of people associated with a company.
‚û°Ô∏è To switch from Founder #1 to Founder #2, change the **item number** or **array index** ‚Äî for example, from `[0]` to `[1]`.

üí° This is useful when a company has **multiple co-founders** or key executives you may want to evaluate separately.

---

## ü§ñüì® **SECTION 3: AI-Powered Summary + Email Outreach**

**üß± Nodes:**

* ü§ñ **AI Agent ‚Äì Generate Email Summary**
* üìß **Gmail ‚Äì Send Founder Digest**

---

### üß† What This Section Does

ü§ñ **AI Agent ‚Äì Generate Email Summary**
This uses **OpenAI‚Äôs GPT model** with a **Structured Output Parser** to turn the extracted profile into a polished, professional email-ready summary.
It's trained to output:

> Jane Doe is currently Co-Founder & CEO at Acme AI. She is a serial entrepreneur with 10+ years in AI and SaaS. Educated at Stanford (MBA). Connect on LinkedIn: [https://linkedin.com/in/janedoe](https://linkedin.com/in/janedoe)

üìß **Gmail ‚Äì Send Founder Digest**
Finally, this node **sends the email** ‚Äî which could go to your team, your CRM, or even directly to your inbox ‚Äî with a subject like:

> üöÄ Startup Founder Highlights for Outreach - June 6, 2025

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## üîÅ **SECTION 1: Trigger + Company Fetching**

**üß± Nodes:**

* üîò **Manual Trigger**
* üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Updated Companies List**

---

### üöÄ What This Section Does

üîò **Manual Trigger**
This allows you to manually run the automation anytime you want. Perfect for testing or when you only want to fetch founder data on demand (instead of a scheduled time).

üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Updated Companies List**
This node connects to the **Crunchbase API** to get a list of the latest startups or companies that have been updated recently.

#### üîß What You Can Customize

üõ†Ô∏è **Page Query**:
In the URL or query parameters, you'll find something like `page=1`.
‚û°Ô∏è You can manually change this to `page=2`, `page=3`, etc., to explore other sets of companies.

üõ†Ô∏è **Date Filter**:
The `updated_since` parameter can also be changed to look for startups updated within a certain time window.

---

## üë§ **SECTION 2: Founder Profile Fetching + Field Mapping**

**üß± Nodes:**

* üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Founder Profiles by UUID**
* ‚úèÔ∏è **Edit Fields ‚Äì Extract Key Profile Data**

---

### üîé What This Section Does

üåê **HTTP Request ‚Äì Fetch: Founder Profiles by UUID**
For each company fetched in Section 1, this node pulls the **detailed profile** of one person (typically a founder, CEO, or C-level executive).

‚úèÔ∏è **Edit Fields ‚Äì Extract Key Profile Data**
This step takes the raw profile data and selects only the fields we care about:
‚úÖ Full Name,
‚úÖ Title,
‚úÖ Biography,
‚úÖ Education,
‚úÖ Social Links,
‚úÖ Associated Companies

#### üîß What You Can Customize

üî¢ **Person Indexing**:
In this node‚Äôs configuration, you can find the list of people associated with a company.
‚û°Ô∏è To switch from Founder #1 to Founder #2, change the **item number** or **array index** ‚Äî for example, from `[0]` to `[1]`.

üí° This is useful when a company has **multiple co-founders** or key executives you may want to evaluate separately.

---

## ü§ñüì® **SECTION 3: AI-Powered Summary + Email Outreach**

**üß± Nodes:**

* ü§ñ **AI Agent ‚Äì Generate Email Summary**
* üìß **Gmail ‚Äì Send Founder Digest**

---

### üß† What This Section Does

ü§ñ **AI Agent ‚Äì Generate Email Summary**
This uses **OpenAI‚Äôs GPT model** with a **Structured Output Parser** to turn the extracted profile into a polished, professional email-ready summary.
It's trained to output:

> Jane Doe is currently Co-Founder & CEO at Acme AI. She is a serial entrepreneur with 10+ years in AI and SaaS. Educated at Stanford (MBA). Connect on LinkedIn: [https://linkedin.com/in/janedoe](https://linkedin.com/in/janedoe)

üìß **Gmail ‚Äì Send Founder Digest**
Finally, this node **sends the email** ‚Äî which could go to your team, your CRM, or even directly to your inbox ‚Äî with a subject like:

> üöÄ Startup Founder Highlights for Outreach - June 6, 2025

#### üõ†Ô∏è What You Can Customize

* ‚úçÔ∏è Change the **recipient** to your sales or outreach inbox
* üñãÔ∏è Modify the **subject line** to match your brand or campaign
* üì¨ Send to **multiple emails** using a comma-separated list

---

## ‚úÖ Final Thoughts: How You Can Use This

This workflow is perfect for:

* üöÄ Startup Scouts
* üì¨ Cold Outreach Campaigns
* üß† VC Analysts or Tech Researchers
* üß© Enriching founder data in your CRM

üí• **No more copy-pasting Crunchbase profiles manually!**
Just trigger the workflow, skim the summaries, and reach out.

---

properties.title: Co-Founder & CEO
properties.biography: Jane Doe is a serial entrepreneur with over 10 years of experience in AI and SaaS startups.
